overview: Chip Davis, Jackson Berkey and the rest of the Mannheim Steamroller ensemble accompany of panel of scientists as they engage in a discussion pondering the existence, expansion and infinite nature of the universe. Against a series of mesmerizing video backdrops and joined by the London Symphony, Davis and company offer a hypnotic soundtrack that blends seamlessly with the enlightening exploration of cosmology, philosophy and the like.
title: Mannheim Steamroller: Fresh Aire 8
